headline.main: THE FACULTY ON CHOLERA.; THE ACADEMY OF MEDICINE. AUGUST MEETING.

docs.lead_paragraph: The meeting convened at 8 o'clock on Wednesday evening in the large Chapel of the University. A goodly attendance was there, though not very punctually, Dr. J. M. SMITH took the Chari. The President introduced to members Dr. NAPPERRIS, of Havana, and Dr. McGRATH, of Jamaice, W. L., both corresponding members, who were president.

headline.main: FROM WASHINGTON.; EMIGRANT VESSELS BILL. Interesting Congressional Proceedings. Important Conerning the spanish Insurrection. Rasification of Save. I Sedian Trenties. docs.lead_paragraph: The following are the cheif provisions of the important bill reported to-day by Mr. FISH, for the better protection of life and health on board of passenger ships: SECTION 1. Requires all emigrant passenger ships to have a clean space, at all times, on the upper deck for a promenade for air and exercise, to be mereused in proportion to the number of passengers;

docs.lead_paragraph: We know a man who last Summer hired four colts pastured on a farm some five miles distant. At least once in two weeks he got into a wagon, and drove over to see how his juvenile horses fared. He made minute inquiries of the keeper as to their health, their daily watering, , he himself examined the condition of the pasture;

docs.lead_paragraph: From the Buffalo Express. The Board of Health of the village of Lockport have literally placed their goodly town in a state of quarantine. headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The ??. SUICIDES. SERIOUS AFFRAY. ARRIVAL OF STEAMERS. THE COURTS. FATAL RAILWAY ACCIDENTS. A Cholera Incident.

docs.lead_paragraph: In Williamsburg, three cases and no deaths. Number of cases reported last week, 26; deaths, 13. The public school-house in Tenth-street, north of Ainsile; street, has been fitted up as a Cholera Hospital by the Board of Health. It was opened yesterday, and one patient was received.

headline.main: The Cholera at Burbadoes--Terrible Conditions of Affairs.

docs.lead_paragraph: Our Just accounts from Barbadoes, it will be remembered, were of the most melancholy character--the cholera having swept over the plantations with a deedly effect almost unheard of. We are now in receipt of advices to the 4th July, which we regret to say show but very little improvement. The disease has been existence at Bridgetown stone six weeks. The West Indian says:

headline.main: MISSOURI.; Political Condition and Prospects in Missouri.

docs.lead_paragraph: As the political contest, now in progress in this State, is watched with keen eyes from Washington and many other political observatories, I shall describe to you as accurately as I can, the state of public feeling in this city and State.
